books.author: by Janet Evanovich
books.description: A killer is after the bounty hunter Stephanie Plum, who faces further complications as she tries to choose a boyfriend.
books.name: SMOKIN’ SEVENTEEN

books.author: by Kathryn Stockett
books.description: A young white woman and two black maids in 1960s Mississippi.
books.name: THE HELP

books.author: by George R.R. Martin
books.description: In the frozen wastes to the north of Winterfell, sinister and supernatural forces are mustering.
books.name: A GAME OF THRONES

books.author: by Sara Gruen
books.description: After his parents are killed in a car accident, a young veterinary student — and an elephant — save a Depression-era circus.
books.name: WATER FOR ELEPHANTS

books.author: by Tom Clancy with Peter Telep
books.description: Maxwell Moore pursues the terrorists who killed his C.I.A. colleagues in a bomb attack in Pakistan.
books.name: AGAINST ALL ENEMIES

books.author: by James Rollins
books.description: The discovery of a lost colony reveals a conspiracy from the nation’s founding; a Sigma Force novel.
books.name: THE DEVIL COLONY

books.author: by Ann Patchett
books.description: In the Amazon basin, a medical researcher searches for her former mentor, a despotic scientist who is developing a miracle fertility drug.
books.name: STATE OF WONDER

books.author: by George R.R. Martin
books.description: From the citadel of Dragonstone to the shores of Winterfell, factions vie for control of a divided land; Book 2 of "A Song of Ice and Fire."
books.name: A CLASH OF KINGS

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: As Christmas nears, a terminally ill man is preparing his family for his death when another tragedy strikes.
books.name: ONE SUMMER

books.author: by Elin Hilderbrand
books.description: The wife of a Wall Street crook retreats to Nantucket, where she faces an array of relationship troubles.
books.name: SILVER GIRL

books.author: by Karen Kingsbury
books.description: While Bailey Flanigan pursues her dream of being an actress in New York, Cody coaches small-town high school football.
books.name: LEARNING

books.author: by Emma Donoghue
books.description: The entire world of the 5-year-old boy who narrates this novel is the 11-by-11-foot room in which his mother is being held prisoner.
books.name: ROOM

books.author: by Karin Slaughter
books.description: The mother of the Georgia cop Faith Mitchell is taken hostage, and the evidence unveils police corruption, bribery and murder.
books.name: FALLEN

books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: Detective Lindsay Boxer and the Women’s Murder Club race to find a missing baby.
books.name: 10TH ANNIVERSARY

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: A hacker and a journalist investigate the disappearance of a Swedish heiress 40 years earlier.
books.name: THE GIRL WITH THE DRAGON TATTOO
